transArray.content: The room is clean and hygienic, the layout of the facilities is very reasonable, I am very satisfied with the service at the front desk, the water glasses in the room are also very clean and sterilized! The door is also very convenient~

Hello, dear guests, the cat is rolling in the fallen leaves, the sunset is filling the sky, the wind is blowing my longing for you to the world that my little man loves, itâ€™s just you, my little man who loves you.
